rules.title: Webhook/external POST
rules.description: POST requests to external URLs may be exfiltrating data.
rules.remediation: Audit external network requests and ensure they are expected.

rules.title: Discord/Slack/Telegram webhook
rules.description: Webhooks to chat services are commonly used for data exfiltration.
rules.remediation: Webhook URLs should be reviewed for legitimacy.

rules.title: Suspicious IP address
rules.description: Hard-coded IP addresses may indicate C2 communication.
rules.remediation: Review hard-coded IP addresses for legitimacy.

rules.title: Curl/wget POST with sensitive file data
rules.description: Using curl or wget to POST sensitive files (SSH keys, env files, credentials) to an external server.
rules.remediation: Remove data exfiltration commands targeting sensitive files.

rules.title: File read and network send pattern
rules.description: Reading sensitive files and sending their contents over the network.
rules.remediation: Audit code that reads sensitive files and makes network requests.
